name: Newbury Networks
overview: Newbury Networks, Inc. develops, markets, and supports location solutions for wireless local area networks in enterprises and public sector government organizations in the United States. It offers Newbury Location Appliance, an infrastructure-agnostic wireless location appliance; Newbury Active Asset, an asset tracking and management solution for wireless local area networks; Newbury RF Firewall, location-based access control and policy enforcement for wireless local area networks; Newbury Digital Docent, which provides location-based content provisioning or push capabilities in an easy-to-deploy application management package; Newbury Presence Platform, an extensible software platform to develop and deploy location-enabled applications on top of industry standard WLAN infrastructure; and Newbury AT-320 Asset Tag, an active RFID tag for Wi-Fi Based asset tracking solutions. The company serves corporate enterprises, healthcare, education, government, financial services, hospitality, public sector/museums, and transportation industries through its strategic business partners. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts. Newbury Networks, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Juniper Networks, Inc.
